name: Big Buck Hunter Pro
overview: BE A HUNTER HERO! Lock n' Load and hit the great outdoors with Big Buck Hunter Pro, the #1 arcade hunting game! Whether you're a beginner or a pro, it's always hunting season with Big Buck Hunter Pro. Bag dozens of big game critters! Take aim across 75 action-packed adventures. Sharpen your skills with 15 Mini Games favorites! JUST LIKE THE ARCADE. PLAY SOLO, HUNT HEAD TO HEAD, (or with up to 4 Players)!
